entities.description: Imputation-revised version of the nicotine dependence variable derived from the NDSS and FTND.
Nicotine dependence in past month, based on NDSS and FTND criteria.
Indicates whether the respondent had nicotine dependence in the past month.
Predicts nicotine dependence using questionnaire data, logically assigned data, or statistically imputed data.

relationships.description: Defines nicotine dependence in the past month using NDSS criteria.
Defines nicotine dependence in the past month using FTND criteria.
Revised version of nicotine dependence variable from PMNICDEP.
Predicts nicotine dependence using questionnaire data, logically assigned data, or statistically imputed data.
